channel.title: Ok question about the client ingame
channel.description: hi im wondering what file deals with this: when you are ingame and you type to say something where is that handled? and where in the file is it handled?

item.title: Ok question about the client ingame
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:10, topic:519251”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=637713.msg4299884#msg4299884 date=1368818036]
Tip to OP, Ready some Java books and in a weeks time you will dominate the dead rsc scene
[/quote]
Ive did some tuts online… but i didnt dominate lol. i know basics… what books are you talking about. what specifically should i be looking to learn? i used buckys tuts before, but that was a while ago.[/quote]

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

Read full topic

item.title: Ok question about the client ingame
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote=“tigerclan, post:6, topic:519251”][quote author=matty matt link=topic=637713.msg4298522#msg4298522 date=1368614034]

Why don’t you actually take a moment and actually think before mindlessly posting a topic. It gets fùcking annoying seeing you post stupid questions like this, especially since you find the answer shortly after you post.

Come back when you need some real help, and not where to locate *.

i know man i annoy myself, but when i do ask for real help then i never recieve it. When i need real help it seems i get no where here besides people bashing. :
[/quote]

it is because of posts like this. if you look at this help forum you probably notice that around 90% of the topics are your own and some of them arent that complex if you looked through the code a little bit. I say if you spend an hour or two looking for the chat implementations and then still somehow cant find it, then yeah, make a post. but here it looks like you didnt put in any effort[/quote]
90 percent?? are you dumb? lol im on the first page of like 100. plus for others wondering these things they can learn them from here… and also maybe all this can spark some more interest in RSC community go get people to want to learn and learn

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:
